snippet: The National Head Start Association estimates that nearly 19,000 children from low-income families have lost or are at risk of losing services in 11 states because of the government shutdown.
abstract: The National Head Start Association estimates that nearly 19,000 children from low-income families have lost or are at risk of losing services in 11 states because of the government shutdown.

headline.main: Some Head Start Programs Close, and Others May Soon
